channel.title: dns on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in dns on Barefoot Rob

item.title: mt3 site is effed up
item.description:
15:38 Monday 15 October 2018 JST Dang marbletrack3.com is broken now. Netlify created the SSL cert and neither of my browsers like it. I will switch back to hosting on Dreamhost if Netlify cannot sort it out.
I have created a support ticket with Netlify. And to think I was about ready to shift all my static sites over.
